name: vimeo-upload
description: Upload videos to your Vimeo account and update their metadata directly from a browser or a Node.js app.

scripts.predeploy: mkdir -p ${npm_package_deploy_dist} && npm run copy -s&& cd $npm_package_deploy_dist && git init && git config user.name $npm_package_deploy_name && git config user.email $npm_package_deploy_email && git add -A . && git commit -am "$npm_package_deploy_message"

author: Adnan M.Sagar, PhD.
